trait.name: Frozen Camoflage
entries: While motionless in snowy or icy terrain, the Tundra Hunger is indistinguishable from natural land.

trait.name: False Ground
entries: A creature walking over the Hunger must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or fall {@condition prone}

trait.name: Tundra Hunger
entries: As a bonus action, the Hunger causes frost-covered tendrils to erupt in a 10-ft radius. Creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength save or be pulled 5 ft. toward it and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 15})

action.name: Frost Maw {@recharge 5}
entries: The Hunger splits the earth open in a 10-ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 26 ({@damage 6d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail are also knocked {@condition prone}

action.name: Icy Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 6 cold damage.

trait.name: Chilling Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Yuki-onna must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage and have disadvantage on the first attack roll it makes before the end of its turn.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: The Yuki-onna's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells:
- At will: {@spell ray of frost}, {@spell thaumaturgy}, {@spell minor illusion}
- 3/day: {@spell mirror image}, {@spell hold person}, {@spell  sleet storm}

action.name: Freezing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be slowed (movement halved, âˆ’2 AC, no reactions) until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Kiss of Winter (1/Day)
entries: The Yuki-onna targets a creature she can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be cursed. While cursed:
- Healing the creature receives is halved.
- It has disadvantage on death saving throws.
- It is vulnerable to cold damage.
This curse lasts until removed by remove curse, greater restoration, or similar magic.
{@b Homebrew Creature:} Yuki-onna, a hauntingly beautiful fey who haunts snow-covered forests, luring travelers to their doom with supernatural grace and deceptive illusions.

bonus.name: Froststep {@recharge 4|6}
entries: As a The Yuki-onna teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see. An illusory copy appears in her original location until the start of her next turn. A creature can discern the illusion with a successful {@dc 15} Intelligence (Investigation) check.
